title: In-text plates (folio 10) from Poésie de mots inconnus
medium: Etchings from an illustrated book with seven woodcuts, seven etchings (two with aquatint, one with engraving), six lithographs, three drypoints, two engravings, one aquatint, and one linoleum cut
dimensions: plate (upper, partial): 6 1/8 x 4 11/16" (15.5 x 11.9cm); plate (lower, partial): 6 1/8 x 4 5/8" (15.6 x 11.8cm); page: 12 5/8 × 9 13/16" (32 × 25 cm)
